eventDecorators.name: LogFlashBorrow
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: LogFlashPayback
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

functionDecorators.name: addFeeAmount
functionDecorators.description: Add Fee Amount to borrowed flashloan/.

parameterDecorators.name: setId
parameterDecorators.description: Set token amount at this ID in `InstaMemory` Contract.
